newsitem.title: USA: Omega makes purchase, invests $17.7 million.
newsitem.headline: Omega makes purchase, invests $17.7 million.

text.p: Omega Healthcare Investors Inc said it had bought four skilled nursing facilities containing 517 beds from Manor Healthcare Corp, a subsidiary of Manor Care Inc.
Omega also entered into a lease agreement with Sunrise Healthcare Corp, a subsidiary of Sun Healthcare Group Inc. The purchase/lease transaction represent a $17.7 million investment for Omega.
Sun Healthcare is headquartered in Albuquerque, N.M., and operates about 15,000 nursing home beds.
Omega is a real estate investment trust investing in and providing financing to the long-term care industry.
